com.zhukovsd.generator

Class Maze<T extends EmbeddedVertex<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zhukovsd.generator.DrawableMaze
      • com.zhukovsd.generator.Maze<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of vertex which forms initial graph of current maze generator

    public class Maze<T extends EmbeddedVertex<T>>
extends DrawableMaze
    Actual maze implementation, parametrized with vertex type.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  Maze.MazeGenerationOptions
      Options of maze generation.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.zhukovsd.generator.DrawableMaze

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) DualGraph<T> dualGraph
      Dual graph of initial graph, each its vertex corresponds to face of initial graph, represents MazeGraphKind.DUAL_GRAPH.
      (package private) DualGraphView<T> dualView
      View of dualGraph.
      (package private) DualVertex<T> entryVertex
      Vertex, which lays inside of face, which is first face of maze path.
      (package private) DualVertex<T> exitVertex
      Vertex, which lays inside of face, which is the destination face of maze path.
      (package private) EmbeddedGraph<T> graph
      Graph with initial configuration of walls, represents MazeGraphKind.INITIAL_GRAPH.
      (package private) EmbeddedGraphView<T> graphView
      View of graph.
      Maze.MazeGenerationOptions mazeGenerationOptions
      Current maze generation options.
      (package private) SubGraph<DualVertex<T>> pathSpanningTree
      Spanning tree of dual graph, which represents all possible paths in initial graph, corresponds to MazeGraphKind.PATH_SPANNING_TREE.
      (package private) SubGraphView<DualVertex<T>,DualGraph<T>,DualGraphView<T>> pathView
      View of pathSpanningTree.
      (package private) SubGraph<T> resultingGraph
      Resulting walls configuration, which is subgraph of initial graph non-including walls, intersected by path spanning tree, corresponds to MazeGraphKind.RESULTING_GRAPH.
      (package private) SubGraphView<T,EmbeddedGraph<T>,EmbeddedGraphView<T>> resultingView
      View of resultingGraph.
      (package private) SubGraph<SubGraphVertex<DualVertex<T>>> shortestPath
      Shortest path in path spanning tree, which represents maze solution, corresponds to MazeGraphKind.SHORTEST_PATH.
      (package private) SubGraphView<SubGraphVertex<DualVertex<T>>,SubGraph<DualVertex<T>>,SubGraphView<DualVertex<T>,DualGraph<T>,DualGraphView<T>>> shortestPathView
      View of shortestPath.

        SubGraph<SubGraphVertex<DualVertex<T extends EmbeddedVertex<T>>>> shortestPath

      • shortestPathView

        SubGraphView<SubGraphVertex<DualVertex<T extends EmbeddedVertex<T>>>,SubGraph<DualVertex<T extends EmbeddedVertex<T>>>,SubGraphView<DualVertex<T extends EmbeddedVertex<T>>,DualGraph<T extends EmbeddedVertex<T>>,DualGraphView<T extends EmbeddedVertex<T>>>> shortestPathView
        View of shortestPath.

      • resultingGraph

        SubGraph<T extends EmbeddedVertex<T>> resultingGraph
        Resulting walls configuration, which is subgraph of initial graph non-including walls, intersected by path spanning tree, corresponds to MazeGraphKind.RESULTING_GRAPH.

      • resultingView

        SubGraphView<T extends EmbeddedVertex<T>,EmbeddedGraph<T extends EmbeddedVertex<T>>,EmbeddedGraphView<T extends EmbeddedVertex<T>>> resultingView

      • exitVertex

        DualVertex<T extends EmbeddedVertex<T>> exitVertex
        Vertex, which lays inside of face, which is the destination face of maze path.

     EmbeddedGraphView<T> graphView)
        Create maze for given initial walls graph and it's graph view. Dual graph also created in constructor.
        Parameters:

        graphView - graph view of initial graph

      • generate

        public void generate()
        Actual maze generation. Find path, find shortest path, build resulting graph.
        Specified by:
        generate in class DrawableMaze

      • buildResultingGraph

        private void buildResultingGraph()
        Build resulting graph, which is initial graph non-including walls, intersected by path spanning tree.

      • removeBoundaryEdge

        private void removeBoundaryEdge(DualVertex<T> vertex)
        Remove boundary edge, which represents entry or exit of maze for player for solver. Find boundary edge of given vertex's face and remove it. This edge have to be outer (not adjacent to any other face) or adjacent to ant of excluded vertexes face.
        Parameters:
        vertex - given vertex
